title: Nýr LG 34UM60-P 34-Inch IPS WFHD (2560 x 1080) Ultrawide Freesync Monitor (2017 Model)

posts.text:
Til sölu nýr LG 34UM60-P 34-Inch IPS WFHD (2560 x 1080) Ultrawide Freesync Monitor 2017 Model 
Hann er nýr í upprunalegum kassa sem hefur aldrei verið opnaður og er innsiglaður af framleiðanda 
Skipti koma ekki til greina . 
Endilega komið með tilboð. 
Nýr svona skjár í búð kostar 130.000 + 
Verðhugmynd 70.000
Hér kemur lýsing frá framleiðanda 
Stunning 34" 2560 x 1080 21:9 Full HD IPS Display. 
sRGB Over 99% for professional color accuracy 
Dedicated game modes 
On Screen Control + Screen Split 2.0 & Dual Controller 
Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio 
PICTURE QUALITY 
Screen Size	34" 
Panel Type	IPS 
Color Gamut (CIE1931)	sRBG over 99% 
Color Depth(Number of Colors)	8bits (6bit+FRC), 16.7M 
Pixel Pitch(mm)	0.312 x 0.310 
Response Time	5ms 
Refresh Rate	75 Hz 
Aspect Ratio	21:9 
Resolution	2560 x 1080 
Brightness(Typ.)	300nits 
Contrast Ratio	Mega 
Viewing Angle(CR≥10)	178/178 
Surface Treatment(Glare/non Glare)	Anti-Glare 3H 
INPUT/OUTPUT 
HDMI	Yes x1 (ver 1.4) 
DisplayPort	Yes x1 (ver 1.2) 
POWER 
Type	Adapter 
Input	100 ~ 240, 50/60Hz 
Normal On (EPA)	31.9W 
SPECIAL FEATURES 
Picture Mode	Custom, Reader, Photo, Cinema, Color Weakness, FPS Game 1, FPS Game 2, RTS Game, Custom (Game) 
Ratio	Wide, Original, Cinema 1, Cinema 2 
PIP (Picture in Picture)	PIP mode in Screen Split 
DDC/CI	Yes 
HDCP	HDMI, Yes (1.4) 
Flicker Safe	Yes 
Smart Energy saving	Yes 
Automatic Standby	Yes 
SIX Axis Control	Yes 
SUPER+Resolution	Yes 
FreeSync	Yes 
Game mode	Yes 
DAS Mode	Yes 
Black Stabilizer	Yes 
Crosshair	Yes 
On Screen Control	Yes 
Dual Controller	Yes 
DIMENSIONS/WEIGHT 
With Stand (WxHxD)	32.7" x 18.1" x 8.1" 
Without Stand (WxHxD)	32.7" x 15.0" x 2.6" 
Shipping Dimensions (WxHxD)	37.3" x 21.0" x 6.6" 
With Stand Weight	14.1 lbs 
Without Stand Weight	12.6 lbs 
Shipping Weight	19.6 lbs 
CABINET / ACCESSORIES 
Wall mount size (mm)	100 x 100 
Tilt (angle)	-5~20 Degree 
Power Cord	Yes 
DP to DP	Yes 
HDMI	Yes x1 (ver 1.4) 
STANDARD 
UL(cUL)	Yes 
TUV-type	Yes 
EPA	Yes
